alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Orangeburg; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 10:30AM EDT until March 26 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Western Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... East central Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 1100 AM EDT. * At 1030 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Santee State Park, or 18 miles northeast of Brookdale, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Sumter, Orangeburg, Manning, South Sumter, Brookdale, Summerton, Elloree, Alcolu, Santee State Park, Orangeburg County Airport, Millwood, Poinsett State Park, Santee, Pinewood, Cameron, Paxville, Vance, Cane Savannah, Poplar Creek Landing and Rimini. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 147 and 160. Interstate 95 between mile markers 91 and 122. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
